articles.author: Surfer
articles.description:
Could u imagine only a 3.7% drawdown over the next year? Bears would lose their freaking minds 😵‍💫 😵‍💫 😵‍💫

Jonathan Harrier, CMT: Notable study on strength...
Happened July 24:
1) 80%+ of $SPX stocks above their 50-ma for 10 days
2) 80%+ $SPX stocks above their 20-ma
3) 70%+ $SPX stocks above their 200-ma
N = 21 since 1985
14.9% avg 1-yr return
3.7% avg drawdown 
20/21 higher 1-yr out
$SPY
See Table 👇
articles.title: Could u imagine only a 3.7% drawdown over the next year? Bears would lose their freaking minds 😵‍💫 😵‍💫 😵‍💫

articles.author: Surfer
articles.description:
Bull mkt just getting started id think. VC investment is a contra

John Reed Stark: In 2022, VCs poured over $21B into crypto startups. At mid-year 2023, that number is a paltry $500M. This dramatic decline is not a cyclical correction but rather a clear and convincing harbinger. Word on the street: The crypto-emperor has no clothes.
https://finance.yahoo.com/news/crypto-vc-investment-drops-70-011330532.html
articles.title: Bull mkt just getting started id think. VC investment is a contra
